    • Method Detail

      • sacle

        public void sacle(double x,
         double y,
         double z)
        sets this matrix's scaling values, not that it is better to use the scaleUniform method for uniform scaling as that uses the 4th value in the homogeneous matrix to do scaleing and it is faster
        Parameters:
        x - x scale factor
        y - y scale factor
        z - z scale factor

      • scaleUniform

        public void scaleUniform(double s)
        uniformly scale the object
        Parameters:
        s - the scale factor

      • rotateX

        rotate around the X axis
        Parameters:
        theta - the amount to rotate in radians

      • rotateY

        public void rotateY(double theta)
        rotate around the Y axis
        Parameters:
        theta - the amount to rotate in radians

      • rotateZ

        public void rotateZ(double theta)
        rotate around the Z axis
        Parameters:
        theta - the amount to rotate in radians

      • rotate

        public void rotate(double x,
          double y,
          double z)
        rotate around the X, Y, and Z axes in that order
        Parameters:
        x - the amount in radians to rotate around the x axis
        y - the amount in radians to rotate around the y axis
        z - the amount in radians to rotate around the z axis

      • translate

        public void translate(double x,
             double y,
             double z)
        translate the object to a new position
        Parameters:
        x - the distance along the X axis to move the object
        y - the distance along the Y axis to move the object
        z - the distance along the Z axis to move the object
